message.content:
Reinforcement Learning, Neural Networks

The paper belongs to the sub-category of Reinforcement Learning as it presents a new algorithm for improving advantage updating in reinforcement learning systems. It also discusses the application of reinforcement learning to a Markov game.

The paper also belongs to the sub-category of Neural Networks as it uses a single-hidden-layer sigmoidal network to store the advantage function. It also presents a new algorithm, Incremental Delta-Delta, for use in incremental training of neural networks.
